name: regz.info Public Scratch Pad
tagline: Personal clipboard for notes of all topics which can be public. Creative spelling and grammer is used.
body:
OTRS - search to find tickets open for multiple clients:

clientA OR clientB OR clientC

***

A developer work flow - rather quick rant but better then nothing.

* Who are the poeple I need to communicate with?
* What is the documentation and tests for the project?
* What is being required?
* Get access to verious envs - authenticate etc....
* Set-up dev environment - check and test that you have the right code and it works properly
* Do development check in stuff or document stuff or talk to people or learn stuff
* Sep-up prod deployment environment and pull work from you dev environment
* Think
* Deploy
* Email people close tickets

***

Words
* 150 - from Dictionary browsing
* 150 - from English to Vietnamese of selected topics
* 100 - from Reading VN bible
20 words per day for 20 days... Ä‘i

***
UI Interaction in Plone - The publication state is more significant for a content items permissions then the sharing tab. Meaning that a user might click on the sharing tab for a published item - uncheck the "inherit permissions" tick box and then click "View" for the group that they are intending to restrict permissions not realising that their intention to restrict is trumped by the publication state of the item. The sharing tab should not allow or at least give warning when you try to grant permissions to a group or user who already has that permission. Or the publication state should be more clearly assosiated with the permissions model... perhaps even making the sharing tab labeled - "publication and sharing" and displaying the publication implications to the permissions in the tab.
